item.title: Update positions?
item.dc:creator: @drugofanewage drugofanewage
item.description:
@drugofanewage wrote:

I dont know how to put this but i’ll give it a shot… im trying to get it so when someone clicks an object (we’ll say a lever for example) it teleports them to a specific location… lets say 2 spots in front of them (absY + 2)

now on my screen(client side) it teleported me 2 spots infront of where i used to be… but on anyone else’s screen it still shows me in that spot i was before i tele’d over here…

so my problem is i need it to show on everyone else’s screen that i tele’d over to a diffrent location… im not sure why is keeps them in the same spot but im rather confused on this one… any help is very appreciated…

ps. ive tried updateRequired = true; and appearanceUpdateRequired = true; but they dont help at all…

heres my the peice of the code

if ((objectID == 9999)
               {
                if(inwildy2 == true)
                {
		teleportToX = absX;
 		teleportToY = (absY - 3);
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
      }
      else
      {
		    sendMessage("Please wait to enter...");
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					}
				}

help is very much appreciated

Read full topic
